channel.title: Need a easy guide to making my own RS Private server *Please help?*
channel.description:
This is ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff from the [LiTHIUM] scripting team and I am here to say I know nothing about making a RS server.
Can anyone give me a guide? With downloads and instructions? Id really appreciate it.
Thanx.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 19, 2006, 06:36:04 pm[/size][hr]Ok also I want to learn Java scripting. Im a novice scripter and I have a WoWEmu I develop (base files not by me, like I said Im a noobie) but after reading posts by you guys I am really interested in it.
Thanx guys.

item.title: Need a easy guide to making my own RS Private server *Please help?*

item.description:
@ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff wrote:

Thanks Ill try it out. And is there anyone here that can help me in case I get stuck?
